cs213.photoAlbum.model
Class User

java.lang.Object
  cs213.photoAlbum.model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The User class contains the information relating to a single user. The fields include the user's ID, the user's full name, and the user's albums. The User class also contains methods for adding, deleting and renaming albums.

Author:
Gal
See Also:
